summary: This is an email chain between an FBI forensic accountant and an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York, scheduling a meeting to discuss a financial update regarding Jeffrey Epstein. The meeting is set for October 24, 2019, at 290 Broadway in New York.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: The recipient of the email who confirms attendance at a scheduled meeting regarding Epstein's financial update.

persons.name: Forensic Accountant FBI New York Field Office
persons.context: The sender who schedules a meeting to discuss Epstein's financial update with prosecutors and other FBI personnel.

connections.person1: Forensic Accountant FBI New York Field Office
connections.person2: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
connections.description: Coordinating a meeting to discuss financial aspects of the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Epstein Financial Update Meeting
events.description: A meeting scheduled at 290 Broadway, 9th floor Criminal conference room, to discuss financial updates regarding Jeffrey Epstein.
personsInvolved: Forensic Accountant FBI New York Field Office
Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York

locations: 290 Broadway, 9th floor Criminal conference room, New York, NY
keyFacts: A meeting was scheduled for October 24, 2019, to discuss financial updates in the Jeffrey Epstein investigation.
The meeting location was 290 Broadway, 9th floor Criminal conference room in New York.
Participants included an FBI forensic accountant and an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York.
The email correspondence indicates ongoing financial investigation into Epstein's affairs as of October 2019.
The document shows coordination between FBI investigators and federal prosecutors on the Epstein case.
